item.title: 开放数据：谷腾堡小说数据
item.description: It is our great pleasure to open the Gutenberg Fiction Dataset. You can get the dataset by participating the 2021 Chinese Contest of Digital Humanities. Learn more about this dataset from its Github repository. 识
